Package View.SpriteMangement

Klasse SpriteSheet

java.lang.Object
View.SpriteMangement.SpriteSheet
public class SpriteSheet extends Object
Manages different Sprites in a Spritesheet.

    • count

    • getSprite

      public BufferedImage getSprite(double progress)
      Returns the current Image to display.
      Parameter:
      progress - : Progress within the animation
      Gibt zurück:
      the Image for the current progress

    • addStateRange

      public void addStateRange(SpriteSheet.State state, int startIndex, int endIndex)
      With this function new states and their corresponding Indexranges on the Spritesheet can be added.
      Parameter:
      state - : Which state does it belong to
      startIndex - : Where does the animation start
      endIndex - : Where does the animation end

    • setState

      public void setState(SpriteSheet.State state)
      Sets a new default State.
      Parameter:
      state - : Default State.

    • setAnimationState

      public void setAnimationState(SpriteSheet.State state)
      Change the Animation to another state.
      Parameter:
      state - the new Animation.
